as if we would let them, they can get fucked if they think they can feed our cg's to their taskmistress.

also, we should agree on a system to divide them before we find them

I propose one CG for each party upon finfing it, when a party recieves one the next one goes to the other.

inside the party there should be a roll of some kind to decide who keeps it, and whoever gets it is out of the next rolls until everyone has goten one.

This way we can have a balance between guild CGs and our crew's CGs
